19 int it_rot = 1;

34 
35 void conf_callback(calib::TFConfig &config, uint32_t level)
36 {
37  ROS_DEBUG("reconfigure");
38 
39  if (config.average == true)
40  {
41  transl_filter_type = 2;
42  rot_filter_type = 2;
43  }
44  else
45  {
46  transl_filter_type = 1;
47  rot_filter_type = 1;
48  }
49 
50  transl_filter_weight = config.filter_weight;
51  transl_filter_weight = pow(10, -transl_filter_weight);
52 
53  rot_filter_weight = config.filter_weight;
54  rot_filter_weight = pow(10, -rot_filter_weight);
55 
56  prev_transl_method = transl_filter_type;
57  prev_transl_method = rot_filter_type;
58 
59  rejection = config.rejection;
60 
61  if (prev_transl_method != 2 && transl_filter_type == 2)
62  {
63  it_transl = 0;
64  mem.setOrigin(origin);
65  }
66  if (prev_rot_method != 2 && rot_filter_type == 2)
67  {
68  it_rot = 0;
69  mem.setRotation(identity_quat);
70  }
71 }
72 
73 tf::Transform filter_tf(tf::Transform mem, tf::StampedTransform new_tf, float ratio_transl, float ratio_rot)
74 {
75  ROS_DEBUG("filter");
76  tf::Transform result;
77  tf::Vector3 res_o = (1 - ratio_transl) * mem.getOrigin() + ratio_transl * new_tf.getOrigin();
78  tf::Quaternion res_q = mem.getRotation() * tfScalar(1 - ratio_rot) + new_tf.getRotation() * tfScalar(ratio_rot);
79  result.setOrigin(res_o);
80  result.setRotation(res_q);
81 
82  return result;
83 }
84 
85 bool valid(tf::Transform mem, tf::Transform transform)
86 {
87  if (mem.getOrigin().distance(transform.getOrigin()) > max_translation) return false;
88  double rx1, ry1, rz1;
89  double rx2, ry2, rz2;
90  tf::Matrix3x3 mat1(mem.getRotation());
91  mat1.getEulerYPR(rx1, ry1, rz1);
92  tf::Matrix3x3 mat2(transform.getRotation());
93  mat2.getEulerYPR(rx2, ry2, rz2);
94  if (abs(rx1 - rx2) > max_rotation || abs(ry1 - ry2) > max_rotation || abs(rz1 - rz2) > max_rotation) return false;
95  return true;
96 }
97 
98 YAML::Node load_config(string file)
99 {
100  YAML::Node config;
101  try
102  {
103  config = YAML::LoadFile(file); // gets the root node
104  }
105  catch (YAML::BadFile bf)
106  {
107  ROS_WARN("No configuration file found, a new one will be created");
108  config = YAML::Load("");
109  }
110  return config;
111 }
112 
113 void save_tf(string frame, tf::Transform transform)
114 {
115  config[frame]["tx"] = transform.getOrigin().getX();// + init_tx;
116  config[frame]["ty"] = transform.getOrigin().getY();// + init_ty;
117  config[frame]["tz"] = transform.getOrigin().getZ();// + init_tz;
118  double rx, ry, rz;
119  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(transform.getRotation());
120  mat.getEulerYPR(rz, ry, rx);
121  config[frame]["rx"] = rx;// + init_rx;
122  config[frame]["ry"] = ry;// + init_ry;
123  config[frame]["rz"] = rz;// + init_rz;
124 
125  std::ofstream fout(file.c_str());
126  fout << config << endl;
127  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_ONCE("Saving tf in: " + file);
128  fout.close();
129 }
130 
131 bool no_nans(tf::Transform transform)
132 {
133  float ty = transform.getOrigin().getY();
134  return !isnan(ty);
135 }
136 
137 bool no_null(tf::Transform transform)
138 {
139  double rx, ry, rz;
140  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(transform.getRotation());
141  mat.getEulerYPR(rz, ry, rx);
142  return (abs(transform.getOrigin().getX()) > 0.0001 && abs(transform.getOrigin().getY()) > 0.0001 && abs(transform.getOrigin().getZ()) > 0.0001 && abs(rx) > 0.0001 && abs(ry) > 0.0001 && abs(rz) > 0.0001);
143 }
144 
145 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
146 {
147  ref = argv[1];
148  string cam1 = argv[2];
149  string cam2 = argv[3];
150  frame = cam1 + "_" + cam2;
151  string node_name = "tf_smoothing_" + frame;
152 
153  // Initialize ROS
154  ros::init(argc, argv, node_name);
155  ros::NodeHandle nh;
156  ros::NodeHandle node_tf("/calib/" + frame + "/tf_filtering");
157 
158  // ros::param::get("/calib/" + cam1 + "/cloud/tx", init_tx);
159  // ros::param::get("/calib/" + cam1 + "/cloud/ty", init_ty);
160  // ros::param::get("/calib/" + cam1 + "/cloud/tz", init_tz);
161  // ros::param::get("/calib/" + cam1 + "/cloud/rx", init_rx);
162  // ros::param::get("/calib/" + cam1 + "/cloud/ry", init_ry);
163  // ros::param::get("/calib/" + cam1 + "/cloud/rz", init_rz);
164 
165  // init_tx /= 1000;
166  // init_ty /= 1000;
167  // init_tz /= 1000;
168  // init_rx /= 180 * 3.14159;
169  // init_ry /= 180 * 3.14159;
170  // init_rz /= 180 * 3.14159;
171 
172  pub = nh.advertise<calib::TF>("/calib/tf/" + frame + "_filtered", 1);
173 
174  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::TFConfig> server(node_tf);
175  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<calib::TFConfig>::CallbackType f;
176  f = boost::bind(&conf_callback, _1, _2);
177  server.setCallback(f);
178 
179  tf::TransformListener listener;
180 
181  std::string path = ros::package::getPath("calib");
182  file = path + "/config/transform.yaml";
183  config = load_config(file);
184 
185  // ROS loop
186  static tf::TransformBroadcaster br;
187  while (ros::ok())
188  {
189  tf::StampedTransform transform;
190  try
191  {
192  listener.waitForTransform(ref, frame, ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(5.0));
193  listener.lookupTransform(ref, frame, ros::Time(0), transform);
194  }
195  catch (tf::TransformException ex)
196  {
197  tf::Transform tr;
198  tr.setIdentity();
199  br.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr, ros::Time::now(), ref, frame));
200  ROS_ERROR("%s",ex.what());
201  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
202  }
203 
204  float ratio_transl, ratio_rot;
205  switch (transl_filter_type)
206  {
207  case 0:
208  it_transl = 0;
209  ratio_transl = 1;
210  break;
211  case 1:
212  it_transl = 0;
213  ratio_transl = transl_filter_weight;
214  break;
215  case 2:
216  it_transl++;
217  ratio_transl = 1 / (float)it_transl;
218  break;
219  }
220  switch (rot_filter_type)
221  {
222  case 0:
223  it_rot = 0;
224  ratio_rot = 1;
225  break;
226  case 1:
227  it_rot = 0;
228  ratio_rot = rot_filter_weight;
229  break;
230  case 2:
231  it_rot++;
232  ratio_rot = 1 / (float)it_rot;
233  break;
234  }
235  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Ratio at it (" << it_transl << " - " << it_rot << ") : " << ratio_transl << ", " << ratio_rot);
236 
237  tf::Transform new_tf = filter_tf(mem, transform, ratio_transl, ratio_rot);
238  if (no_nans(new_tf) && no_null(new_tf))
239  {
240  if (valid(mem, new_tf) || !rejection)
241  {
242  mem = new_tf;
243  br.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(mem, ros::Time::now(), ref, frame + "_filtered"));
244  save_tf(frame, mem);
245  }
246  else
247  {
248  ROS_ERROR("Outlying transform rejected !");
249  }
250  }
251 
252  calib::TF msg;
253  double rx, ry, rz;
254  msg.tx = mem.getOrigin().getX();
255  msg.ty = mem.getOrigin().getY();
256  msg.tz = mem.getOrigin().getZ();
257  msg.it_transl = it_transl;
258  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(mem.getRotation());
259  mat.getEulerYPR(rx, ry, rz);
260  msg.rx = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * rx;
261  msg.ry = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * ry;
262  msg.rz = (float) 180 / 3.14159 * rz;
263  msg.it_rot = it_rot;
264  pub.publish(msg);
265 
266  ros::spinOnce();
267  if (freq > 0)
268  {
269  ros::Rate loop_rate(freq);
270  loop_rate.sleep();
271  }
272  }
273 
274  return 0;
275 }
